title.rendered: LEED Certified Home Featuring Eldorado Stone Gains National Exposure on MSN.com

content.rendered:
The LEED Certified home in Mill Valley, California, featuring Eldorado Stone’s Montecito Cliffstone profile, received national coverage on MSN.com – reaching millions of viewers across the country and highlighting Eldorado Stone’s position as the leader in architectural stone veneer. Readers were encouraged to tour the home via Eldorado Stone’s impressive “Hillside Home” video tour.

Read the article at MSN.com:  MSN National Coverage Article
